titleStmt.title: The danger of discontentment intreated of in a sermon preached at Crowhurst in Surrey the ninth of Iuly 1598. By Simon Harward.
titleStmt.author: Harward, Simon, fl. 1572-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: by W. W[hite] for R. Iohnes,

notesStmt.note: Imprint varies: as above, or "W. White, 1599", without day and month mentioned.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
